name: Sargon's Sprint
description: Sargon's curse has struck again! The loatron can't stop running. His protective magic sends him racing off and he can't stop for the rocks in his way. Help Sargon stay on his hooves as long as possible. Then read about loatrons, treacherous dragons, and other magical creatures in Sargon The Not So Great, book one in the Tales of Enda series.
